summary: This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information for Jeffrey Epstein and associated individuals, detailing account ownership, relationships, and financial details related to the Butterfly Trust accounts at Deutsche Bank. It includes personal information, account purposes, and the expected financial activities of the accounts. This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information related to various individuals and legal entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including details about their financial backgrounds, relationships with Deutsche Bank, and the structure of the Butterfly Trust. It highlights the due diligence process undertaken by Deutsche Bank in assessing the risk associated with these clients.

The document indicates that the trust is for the benefit of six named individuals, although their names are not disclosed.
